config.script:
import traceback
	try:
		selectedColumn = self.props.selection.selectedColumn
		participantID = self.props.data.getValueAt(event.row,'ID')
		shelterID = self.props.data.getValueAt(event.row,'shelterId')
		#system.perspective.print(selectedColumn)
		#system.perspective.print(participantID)
		system.perspective.print(shelterID)
		if selectedColumn == "Detail" or selectedColumn == "Name": 
			#Display the detail screen
			#system.perspective.print('Participant Detail')
			tab_id = 1
			system.perspective.navigate("Participants/Detail/" + str(participantID) + "/" + str(tab_id))
		#elif selectedColumn == "Options":
		elif selectedColumn == "ID":
			id = "PreviewParticipant" 
			params = {"participantID":participantID}
			system.perspective.openDock(id=id,params=params)
		elif selectedColumn == "Shelter": 
			#system.perspective.navigate("Shelter/0")
			system.perspective.navigate(view = 'Shelter/Detail/Shelter_Detail', params = {'shelterID':shelterID})
		elif selectedColumn == "reservation": 
			system.perspective.navigate("Shelter/20")
		else:
			pass
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Dashboard Participants_table OnRowClick")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

transforms.code:
where = self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.Shelter.where
	AllShelterIds = ''
	if value != None and value != '':
		for shelterId in value:
			if -2 == shelterId:
				query = """
					SELECT id FROM lodging.Facility WHERE facilityName IS NOT NULL AND facilityName NOT IN ('532 Apartments','705 Apartments') AND timeRetired IS NULL ORDER BY facilityName
						"""
				result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query,[],'HMSOps')
				shelter_All = [ dict(shelter_one = x[0]) for x in result]
				for shelter_one in shelter_All:
					AllShelterIds = AllShelterIds + str(shelter_one['shelter_one']) + ','
			else:
				AllShelterIds = AllShelterIds + str(shelterId) + ','
		AllShelterIds = '(' + str(AllShelterIds[:-1]) + ')'
		where = "shelterId IN " + str(AllShelterIds)
			
	return where

onChange.script:
import traceback
	
	try:
		dataset = currentValue.value
		days = self.view.params.activity_range
		
		if dataset == None:
			system.perspective.sendMessage("yearlyServicesParticipants", payload = {"yearlyServicesParticipants": 0, "days":days}, scope = "page")
			system.perspective.sendMessage("activeParticipants", payload = {"activeParticipants": 0, "days":days}, scope = "page")
			system.perspective.sendMessage("newParticipantsMonthly", payload = {"newParticipantsMonthly": 0}, scope = "page")
			system.perspective.sendMessage("currentSuspensionsParticipants", payload = {"currentSuspensionsParticipants": 0, "days":days}, scope = "page")
			return
	
		nowYear = system.date.getYear(system.date.now())
		thisYear = system.date.parse('Jan 01, '+ str(nowYear) + ' 00:00', 'MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm')
		today = system.date.now()
		oneYearAgo = system.date.addYears(today, -1)
		
		# create date from dayOfYear
		today = system.date.now()
		date_range = system.date.addDays(today, -days)
		if days == 365:
			date_range = thisYear
		
		#Get selected participants
		idlist = []
		suspensionCount = 0
#		for	i in range(dataset.getRowCount()):
#			idlist.append(str(dataset.getValueAt(i, "ID")))
#			if dataset.getValueAt(i, "Suspension") == 1:
#				suspensionCount +=1
		newList = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(system.dataset.filterColumns(dataset, ['ID','Suspension']))
		suspensionList = [str(x[1]) for x in newList if x[1]==1]
		suspensionCount = len(suspensionList)
		newList = [str(x[0]) for x in newList]	
		strIdList = ','.join(newList)		
#		system.perspective.print('idlist:' + str(strIdList))
	
		#KPI1 Total Services This Year 
#		params = {"IdList": strIdList, "thisYear": thisYear}
		params = {"IdList": strIdList, "thisYear": date_range}
		result = system.db.runNamedQuery("Participants/Dashboard/TotalServicesYearToDate", params)
		yearlyServicesParticipants = result.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.sendMessage("yearlyServicesParticipants", payload = {"yearlyServicesParticipants": yearlyServicesParticipants, "days":days}, scope = "page")	
		
		#KPI2 Active participants Over 12 Months
		#params = {"IdList": strIdList, "oneYearAgo": oneYearAgo}
		#result = system.db.runNamedQuery("Participants/Dashboard/ActiveOverOneYear", params)
		#activeParticipants = 0
		#activeIdList = []
		#for	i in range(result.getRowCount()):
		#	nr = result.getValueAt(i, "id")
		#	if nr not in activeIdList:
		#		activeParticipants += 1
		#		activeIdList.append(nr)
		activeParticipants = dataset.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.sendMessage("activeParticipants", payload = {"activeParticipants": activeParticipants, "days":days}, scope = "page")
		
		#KPI3 New Participants Monthly
		MonthCount = 6
		newParticipantsMonthly = []
		params = {"IdList": strIdList, "MonthCount": MonthCount}
		result = system.dataset.toPyDataSet(system.db.runNamedQuery("Participants/Dashboard/NewParticipantsLastNMonths", params))
		
		now = system.date.now()
		for i in range(MonthCount):
			imonthago = system.date.addMonths(now, -i)
			month = system.date.getMonth(imonthago) + 1
			append_item = {"time": system.date.toMillis(imonthago), "Participants": 0}
			for row in result:
				if month == row[0]:
					#system.perspective.print('Month: ' + str(row[0]) + ' Num: ' + str(row[1]))
					append_item["Participants"] = row[1]
					break

			newParticipantsMonthly.append(append_item)

		newParticipantsMonthly.reverse()
		#system.perspective.print(newParticipantsMonthly)
		system.perspective.sendMessage("newParticipantsMonthly", payload = {"newParticipantsMonthly": newParticipantsMonthly}, scope = "page") 
	

		#KPI4 Current Suspensions
		params = {"IdList": strIdList,"days":days}
		result = system.db.runNamedQuery("Participants/Dashboard/CurrentSuspensions", params)
		currentSuspensionsParticipants = result.getRowCount()
		system.perspective.sendMessage("currentSuspensionsParticipants", payload = {"currentSuspensionsParticipants": currentSuspensionsParticipants, "days":days}, scope = "page")

		
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Dashboard Particpants Table custom.SQLData KPI")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

messageHandlers.script:
import traceback
	try:
		#Send the dataset to Excel
		filename = 'participants_dashboard_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.xls'
		dataset = self.props.data
		columnsToKeep = ['Suspension','fullRegistration','Name','NickName','BirthDate','Age','Gender','Race','veteran','billing','LastRegistration','LastActivity','Shelter','reservation']
		newColumnHeaders = ['Suspension','Full Registration','Name','Nickname','Birth Date','Age','Gender','Race and Ethnicity','Veteran','Billing','Registration','Last Activity','Shelter','Reservation']
		
		dataset = system.dataset.filterColumns(dataset, columnsToKeep)
		dataset.setColumnNames(newColumnHeaders)
		xlFile = system.dataset.toExcel(True,dataset)
		system.perspective.download(filename, xlFile)
	except:   
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Dashboard tableToExcel")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

import traceback
	try:
		#Generate the report
		project = "HMS"
		path = "ParticipantsDashboard"
		#parameters = {'activityRange':self.view.params.activity_range,
		#			'genderId':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.GenderId.where}
		parameters = {'activityRange':self.view.params.activity_range,
					'genderId':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.GenderId.where,
					'raceId':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.RaceId.where,
					'veteranId':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.VeteranId.where,
					'firstName':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.FirstName.where,
					'middleName':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.MiddleName.where,
					'lastName':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.LastName.where,
					'nickName':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.NickName.where,
					'dobYear':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.BirthDate.where,
					'minAge':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.MinAge.where,
					'maxAge':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.MaxAge.where,
					'shelter':self.custom.shelterwhere, #:self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.Shelter.where,
					'search':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.Search.where,
					'fullRegistration':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.FullRegistration.where,
					'familyId':self.session.custom.filters.participantDashboard.familyId.where,
					'programId':self.view.params.whereProgram,
					'billing':self.view.params.whereBilling
					}
		pdfFile = system.report.executeReport(path,project,parameters,fileType='pdf')
		filename = 'participants_dashboard_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.pdf'

		system.perspective.download(filename, pdfFile)
	except:   
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Dashboard tableToExcel")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
